title.en: Shachiku ga Isekai ni Tobasareta to Omottara White Kigyou Datta

altTitles.ja-ro: Shachiku ga Isekai ni Tobasareta to Omottara Howaito Kigyou Datta

altTitles.en: A Corporate Slave is Suddenly Isekai’d to a Better Company

altTitles.ja: 社畜が異世界に飛ばされたと思ったらホワイト企業だった

altTitles.en: When a company slave thought they were in another world but was just in a white corporation.

description.en:
From Comic-Walker (& Nico):  
Kasumi, a high school graduate who entered a dark-side company 3 years ago was in the midst of a late night overtime for the 30th day in a row when she wished that she could have "a single day off" to the shooting star she was watching on the roof when suddenly she was swallowed by a mysterious light…… The next thing she knew, she was standing, waiting to be introduced to her new colleagues at "White Products"! Will Kasumi be able to get used to the culture of the light side of business after thinking that the dark side's dealings are "normal"?  
  
From Animate:  
No overtime. Bonus pay. Perfect employee welfare and benefits…… This doesn't exist!  
  
True-blue corporate slave OL Kasumi (20) has slaved away in the dark side of corporate since she graduated 3 years ago and now she's "reincarnated" into an ultra-light side business!? Will Kasumi be able to get used to the culture of the light side of business after thinking that the dark side's dealings are "normal"?  
  
Nico Nico Manga's nomination to the "Kono Manga ga Yabai! 2018" awards!  
Which is more crazy, Kasumi or our "normal"?
